channel.title: Dementhium Yell
channel.description:
What is the symbol to send a yell via command outside of yell? I want it to announce globally when a punishment is handed out. I have tried the following methods [code=java]yell("[Punishment] "+player.getUsername()+" has IP Banned "+other.getUsername()+".");[/code] [code=java]player.yell("[Punishment] "+player.getUsername()+" has IP Banned "+other.getUsername()+".");[/code] [code=java]other.yell("[Punishment] "+player.getUsername()+" has IP Banned "+other.getUsername()+".");[/code] But they all give the following error in the compiler:
symbol: method yell(String) location: variable player of type Player 1 error Complete Press any key to continue . . .
Any help? Will Rep++
